node.text:
The Favourite Kerala Ayurveda & Spa at The Raviz Kovalam with a rooftop yoga pavilion and treatment rooms has a 'Green Leaf' certification by the Department of Tourism in Kerala. The stunning views of the ocean adds to your rejuvenating experience here.

For bookings contact: +91 471 305 1234 | 1800 4252 2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com | reservations@theraviz.com
